2020.context: Instacart (Maplebear Inc.) is a grocery delivery and technology platform focused on grocery delivery, pickup, and retail technology. Pandemic grocery delivery surge. Rapid shopper growth.

competitors.notes: Amazon's grocery delivery competing with Prime integration

competitors.notes: Expanding from restaurants into grocery and convenience

competitors.notes: Food delivery platform adding grocery options

2024.context: Instacart (Maplebear Inc.) is a grocery delivery and technology platform focused on grocery delivery, pickup, and retail technology. IPO. Advertising and enterprise platform expansion.

2025.context: Instacart (Maplebear Inc.) is a grocery delivery and technology platform focused on grocery delivery, pickup, and retail technology. Grocery technology platform. Competing with DoorDash, Amazon.
